attributes.action: Start a Government funded Keep Britain Tidy Campaign on TV and in the Newspapers
attributes.additional_details: Search You tube "ITN NEWS REPORT ON LITTER IN CRAWLEY" this will highlight my campaign nicely. Crawley Observer, Yorkshire post, Crawley News and a few more as well. I walk my dog daily picking up the same type of litter day in day out. Same route its dropped over and over sometimes a few feet from a bin. We need to educate the young through a vigorous campaign. We need to make fast food chains advertise too within there adverts on TV and in the Paper. Climate change is partly the result of littering our planet.
attributes.background: I have been picking up litter in my community for over three years and have filled 600 carry bags. I am ill health retired and find it difficult bending some days. The amount of litter on our streets is appalling and in the countryside.  I have been on TV local news
